item.title: AI Overview & Forum
item.description:
Synchronous Presentation [May 20th, @6:30pm PST][With Yuri Tricys]

Hello All,

AI is THE hot topic right now! I’ve found a few insights you may find interesting in your journey as an educator!

Please fee free to join me for my presentation:

Topic: Exploring AI for Educators
Time: May 27, 2025 06:15 PM Pacific Time (US and Canada)

Join Zoom Meeting: https://us05web.zoom.us/j/88252607231?pwd=jnad5d3YM4e2KHnx7GEXqEs2bJIiYZ.1

View meeting insights with Zoom AI Companion: https://us05web.zoom.us/launch/edl?muid=4855f44c-ac3a-4528-9011-3e888a8dbdc2

Meeting ID: 882 5260 7231
Passcode: jC04Qw

item.title: Frequently asked questions (FAQ)
item.description: Browse this FAQ page to find answers to frequently asked questions that have not been covered elsewhere in the documentation.
